alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:55PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1054 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Wild Horse Point, or 34 miles north of La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Kiowa and northeastern Crowley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
